Verifies that large rules are truncated and can be fully expanded.

Before showing all properties:
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
#inspected { (<style>)
    --var-0: 0px;
    --var-1: 1px;
    --var-2: 2px;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;

element.style { ()
